sentences.sContent: While the United States and Canada balk, other countries are clearing Arctic space for the industry.
sentences.sContent_eng: While the United States and Canada balk, other countries are clearing Arctic space for the industry.
sentences.sCn: 在美国和加拿大逡巡不前的时候，其他国家正在为进军北极清理障碍。

words.tran: 停蹄不前的；倔强的；不愿干的

trans.tranOther: to not want to do or try something, because it seems difficult, unpleasant, or frightening
